Package api.entity

Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameObject, IDInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractItem, Activatable, Book, Button, Chest, Door, Floor, Key, Library, Pane, Player, PressurePlate, Switch

extends GameObject
